motd: Bugfix: When a player completes Reap's minion kill requirement via their ally's Relic Shield's Spoils of War, the player now properly gains 350 gold.
Bugfix: Relic Shield's Spoils of War kills now properly count towards Cull stacks.

unique_passive_2: Killing a minion grants +1 gold, up to a maximum of 100 gold. After having killed 100 minions, grants an additional 350 gold and permanently disables this passive.
Killing a minion grants +1 gold, up to a maximum of 100 gold. After having killed 100 minions, grants an additional 300 gold and permanently disables this passive.
